Articles.Content:
.25 win 8.1 64bit

the .25 upgrade cleared my prefs and I'm back to Kerbin time. Where is the darn setting for Earth time? - it's not gone is it?

I cant make sense of 6 hour days, and I have huge spreadsheet with all my departure windows calculated in earth time.

tia

(does Kerbal Alarm Clock really count as a "Modded install")

(does Kerbal Alarm Clock really count as a "Modded install")

Yes. It's not part of stock KSP, therefore your install is modded.

Yes. It's not part of stock KSP, therefore your install is modded.

oops wrong forum then.

I'm usually not in favor modding games, but how can you possibly play this game (esp w/ >1 ship) w/o the alarm clock?

oops wrong forum then.

I'm usually not in favor modding games, but how can you possibly play this game (esp w/ >1 ship) w/o the alarm clock?

keep a post-it a list of actions and times that stuff needs to happen and quicksave and restore often
